description: Base StructureDefinition for date Type: A date or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). There is no UTC offset. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth and date.  Dates SHALL be valid dates.

element.definition: A date or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). There is no UTC offset. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth and date.  Dates SHALL be valid dates.
